question: In which year, Muzaffarpur Bomb Case happened?
explanation: On 30 April 1908 Bengali youths Khudiram Bose and Prafulla Chaki threw a bomb on a carriage of Chief Presidency Magistrate Douglas Kingsford of Calcutta in Muzzafarpur. Unfortunately, two women traveling in it got killed. Chaki committed suicide when caught. On 11 August 1908, revolutionary Khudiram Bose was hanged by the British at Kolkata. He was only 18 years, 8 months and 8 days old only. Kazi Nazrul Islam wrote a poem to honour him.
